pj_hmac_sha1_context Struct Reference
[HMAC SHA1 Message Authentication]

Data Fields

pj_sha1_context context
pj_uint8_t k_opad [64]

Detailed Description

The HMAC-SHA1 context used in the incremental HMAC calculation.

Field Documentation
